config.timestamp.column.name: EINM_UPDATED_DATE
config.incrementing.column.name: EINM_DOCDTLS_NO
config.query:
select einm_source_doc_type "SOURCE",
       mat.get_comp_name(einm_comp_code) "COMP",
       einm_docdtls_no "DOC_NO",
       to_char(to_date(einm_docdtls_dt, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD-MON-YYYY') "DOC_DATE",
       to_char(einm_creation_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "CR_DATE",
       to_char(einm_updated_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "UP_DATE",
       Cond "Cond",
       error "Actual_Error",
       max(cnt) over(partition by cond) "Count"
  from (select einm_source_doc_type,
               einm_comp_code,
               einm_docdtls_no,
               einm_docdtls_dt,
               einm_creation_date,
               einm_updated_date,
               Cond,
               error,
               row_number() over(partition by cond order by cond) cnt
          from (select einm_source_doc_type,
                       einm_comp_code,
                       einm_docdtls_no,
                       einm_docdtls_dt,
                       einm_creation_date,
                       einm_updated_date,
                       case
                         when ((sysdate -
                              nvl(einm_file_transfer_date,
                                    (x.einm_creation_date + 4 / 1440))) * 24 * 60) <= 20 then
                                    case when nvl(einm_nic_code, einm_pwc_validation_code) is null then
                                      'G'
                                    else
                                      'R'
                                    end
                         when ((sysdate -
                              nvl(einm_file_transfer_date,
                                    (x.einm_creation_date + 4 / 1440))) * 24 * 60) > 20 then
                                    
                                    case when nvl(einm_nic_code, einm_pwc_validation_code) is null then
                                      'D'
                                    else
                                      'R'
                                    end
                       end Cond,
                       nvl(nvl(einm_nic_message, einm_pwc_validation_message),
                           (select genb_buf_desc1
                              from mat.mmat_genb
                             where genb_buf_terminal_no = 'IRNERRC'
                               and genb_buf_num2 =
                                   nvl(einm_nic_code, einm_pwc_validation_code))) error
                  from mat.mmat_einm x
                 where x.einm_creation_date >=
                       to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'dd-mon-yyyy') || ' ' ||
                               '00:00:01',
                               'dd-mon-yyyy hh24:mi:ss')
                   and einm_sub_type != 'For Own Use'
                   and einm_irn is null
                   and einm_source_doc_type <> 'STIG'))

config.timestamp.column.name: DOC_DATE
config.incrementing.column.name: DOC_NO
config.query: select SOURCE, COMP, DOC_NO, DOC_DATE, CR_DATE, UP_DATE, Actual_error, Cond from (select a.parent_group comp , a.inv_type SOURCE, a.inv_num DOC_NO, a.inv_date DOC_DATE, a.created_date CR_DATE, a.modified_date UP_DATE, A.ERR_DESC ACTUAL_ERROR, DECODE (A.STATUS, 'P','D','Q','G','PE','R',A.STATUS) Cond, count(*)   from sh_einvoice a where TRUNC(a.INV_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)    and a.status in ('Q', 'PE') group by a.status,           a.inv_module,           a.parent_group,            a.inv_type,           a.inv_num,           a.inv_date,           a.created_date,           a.modified_date,           A.ERR_DESC UNION ALL select a.parent_group comp, a.inv_type SOURCE, a.inv_num DOC_NO, a.inv_date DOC_DATE, a.created_date CR_DATE, a.modified_date UP_DATE, A.ERR_DESC Actual_error, DECODE (A.STATUS, 'P','D','Q','G','PE','R',A.STATUS) Cond, count(*)   from sh_einvoice_DTL a where TRUNC(a.INV_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)    and a.status in ('P') group by a.status,           a.inv_module,           a.parent_group,            a.inv_type,           a.inv_num,           a.inv_date,           a.created_date,           a.modified_date,           A.ERR_DESC)

config.timestamp.column.name: INVO_DATE
config.incrementing.column.name: INVO_SEQ_NO
config.query:
SELECT *
  FROM (SELECT cc.*
          FROM (SELECT x.invo_invt_type "SOURCE",
                       x.invo_comp_code "COMP",
                       x.invo_seq_no "DOC_NO",
                      TO_CHAR(to_date(x.invo_date), 'DD-MON-YYYY') "DOC_DATE",
                       '' "CR_DATE",
                       '' "UP_DATE",
                       '' "Actual Error",
                       CASE
                         WHEN ((SYSDATE - x.invo_date) * 24 * 60) <= 30 THEN
                          'G'
                         ELSE
                          'R'
                       END Cond
                  FROM mspr_invo x
                 WHERE 1 = 1
                   AND x.invo_date > trunc(SYSDATE) - 1
                   AND x.invo_irn_req_flag = 'Y'
                   AND x.invo_irn_process_flag IN ('I', 'E')
                ) cc
         WHERE 1 = 1
         ORDER BY cc."DOC_DATE" DESC)
WHERE 1 = 1

config.timestamp.column.name: INIQ_INV_DATE
config.incrementing.column.name: INIQ_INV_NUMBER
config.query:
SELECT cc.*
  FROM (SELECT x.INIQ_DATA_SOURCE "SOURCE",
               iniq_status "STATUS",
               x.iniq_inv_prefix || x.iniq_inv_number "DOC_NO",
               TO_CHAR(to_date(x.INIQ_INV_DATE), 'DD-MON-YYYY') "DOC_DATE",
               TO_CHAR(X.INIQ_CREATED_ON, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "CR_DATE",
               TO_CHAR(X.INIQ_INV_PRINT_DATE, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "UP_DATE",
              (select D.INIE_NIC_CODE
                  from SSAL_INIE d
                 where d.inie_doc_num =
                       x.iniq_inv_prefix || x.iniq_inv_number
                       and d.inie_irn_flag='E'
                       and rownum=1) "Actual Error" ,
               CASE
                 WHEN (((sysdate - X.INIQ_INV_DATE)) * 24 * 60) <= 30 THEN
                  'G'
                 ELSE
                  'R'
               END Cond
          FROM ssal_iniq x
         where x.iniq_inv_date > sysdate - 3
           and x.iniq_irn_no is null
           and x.iniq_inv_type not in ('M')
           and x.iniq_inv_print_date is null
     and x.iniq_data_source not in ('SSAL_CRDN', 'SSAL_EXSC')           ) cc
where 1 = 1
order by DOC_DATE DESC
